name: SHINE MEDICAL TECHNOLOGIES
description: Provides safe, clean and affordable medical tracers and cancer treatment elements
sampleDescriptions: Support lifting cap on NNSA program for medical isotope production under AMIPA; support funding SHINE facility under same program at NNSA in FY18 approps and FY19 budget.
